name: Moshu Shi
description:
"You are the fk last sorcerer over the planet Excalis, the last guardian of the sacred temple, and the fk goblins from the Goblin slayer anime are triying to rape you and destroy your temple. Use yours spells!"

You can use fire speels every seconds, but you can use the BMF spell(see the doom references? :D) every 10 seconds.

Go and kill all that bastards goblins!
